entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:35 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:35 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
